data.title: Parsec Warp
data.meta_description: Parsec is a remote desktop you'll actually love. Connect to work, games, or projects wherever you are, whenever you want.
data.text:
Better Color

4:4:4 color mode makes everything sharper, crisper, and colory-er. Available for Windows on NVIDIA hosts running GTX 1000 or newer and 11th-gen or newer Intel CPUs.

Pen + Tablet Support

Plug in your favorite drawing tablet and boom, it just works. Available for both Windows 10+ and macOS 10.15+.

Extra Display Options

Stream up to three monitors at the same time, connect in privacy mode, launch virtual displays, and switch monitors on the fly. Whatever your setup, Warp's got you covered.
